network_overview: The capture shows two independent control-plane transactions: a GTPv2-C Create Session Request/Response pair that failed with Cause 209, and two Diameter Credit-Control-Request exchanges returning Result-Codes 2001 and 4010. No user-plane (GTP-U) or SIP/RTP traffic is present.

observations.finding: Create Session Request (msg 0x10) answered with failure Cause 209 (Unknown) after 65 ms
Two CCR exchanges: one succeeded (2001) in 40 ms, one failed (4010) in 10 ms
Only control-plane packets captured; zero user-plane or voice-related traffic

root_causes.description: SGW/MME rejected the Create Session Request with an undocumented Cause value 209, preventing bearer establishment.
root_causes.impact: No EPS bearer established; user data path unavailable.

root_causes.description: One of two CCR attempts received Result-Code 4010 (DIAMETER_END_USER_SERVICE_DENIED), indicating service rejection by PCRF/OCS.
root_causes.impact: Charging/policy rule installation blocked for that subscriber/session.

inconclusive_aspects.reason: No SIP, RTP, or VoLTE-related protocols observed
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: SIP traces from P-CSCF or SBC, plus RTP on user-plane

inconclusive_aspects.reason: Cause 209 is vendor-specific and not decoded
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Logs from MME/SGW or 3GPP-compliant Cause code
Mirror traffic on S1-U, S5, or SGi interfaces

recommendations.action: Investigate MME/SGW logs for meaning of Cause 209 and rectify bearer setup failure
recommendations.rationale: Bearer creation must succeed before any user data or voice can flow

recommendations.action: Check PCRF/OCS configuration for Result-Code 4010 triggers (e.g., quota exhaustion, service restrictions)
recommendations.rationale: 4010 blocks policy/charging rules, potentially affecting service quality

recommendations.action: Capture simultaneous traces on S1-U/S5-U and SIP interfaces to correlate control-plane rejections with user-plane and call setup
recommendations.rationale: Current capture point only shows partial control-plane view

session_analysis.signaling_health: Mixed: GTP-C bearer setup failed (Cause 209); Diameter CCR 50 % failure rate (4010)
session_analysis.user_plane_health: Not observable: no GTP-U packets captured
session_analysis.voice_quality: Not observable: no RTP or SIP present
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: No correlation possible: user-plane absent and no session spans both GTP-C and Diameter

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant UE
    participant MME
    participant SGW
    participant PGW
    participant PCRF

    Note over MME,SGW: GTP-C
    MME->>SGW: Create Session Request (0x10) TEID=0
    SGW->>MME: Create Session Response (0x11) Cause=209

    Note over PCRF: Diameter
    MME->>PCRF: CCR (session-1)
    PCRF->>MME: CCA Result=2001
    MME->>PCRF: CCR (session-2)
    PCRF->>MME: CCA Result=4010
